title: GARUD HOUSE APARTMENT CONDOMINIUM
detail: Garud House Apartment Condominium offers an exceptional living experience with its 2.5 and 5 BHK apartments. Designed for both elegance and functionality, these residences feature spacious layouts and high-end finishes. Enjoy luxury amenities such as modern kitchens, expansive living areas, and private balconies. With its emphasis on quality construction and sophisticated design, Garud House ensures a harmonious blend of comfort and style, making it an ideal choice for discerning homeowners.
developer_detail: Fortune Developers, founded in 2009, has established itself as a leading real estate developer in Pune, known for its inspiring creations and commitment to quality. Their ISO-rated projects reflect a dedication to world-class standards and ethical practices. With the help of skilled professionals, they create beautifully designed living spaces. Notable projects include Fortune Empress, Fortune Srushti, Fortune Siddhipriya, and Fortune Shubhan.
city_description: Model Colony, a prestigious residential area in the heart of Pune, is known for its serene ambiance, tree-lined streets, and elegant heritage bungalows. Its prime location offers easy access to commercial centers, educational institutions, and hospitals. The area boasts a peaceful environment with a strong sense of community, hosting various social and cultural events.
